commands.name: Actionable
commands.prompt: Convert this text into an actionable task list. Break down any ideas, goals, or concepts into specific, concrete next steps. For each task, include: what needs to be done, any dependencies, estimated time, and priority level (high/medium/low). Format as tasks.

commands.name: Linkedin
commands.prompt: Convert this piece of text into a LinkedIn post
